title: MIE Summer Research Award
sponsor: Mechanical and Industrial Engineering Department at UofT
description: Awarded to one of 21 Mechanical and Industrial Engineering undergraduate students engaging in a summer research position.

title: Dean's List Honor
sponsor: Faculty of Applied Sciences and Engineering at UofT
description: Awarded for achieving above a 79.5% average over the academic year.

title: William Dunbar Memorial Scholarship
sponsor: Mechanical and Industrial Engineering Department at UofT
description: Established in 2014 from the estate of the late William Dunbar, this scholarship is awarded to students in any year of the Mechanical Engineering program on the basis of outstanding academic achievement. Recommendation of the chair of the department.

title: University of Toronto Scholar Award
description: The University of Toronto Scholars Program provides recognition to U of Tâ€™s outstanding students, at admission. Approximately 700 recipients receive this award across all UofT campuses.

title: Future Business Leaders of America 2023 CNLC Economics Objective Test National Finalist
description: Awarded for placing within the top 20 of the FBLA 2023 Canadian National Leadership Conference.
